instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Chivo' font for all headings to give a technical, automotive feel. Import it from Google Fonts.
Implement a 'Garage Mode' (Dark Mode) toggle in the footer, but default to Light Mode for trust.
Use the 'Bento' grid layout for the homepage categories section.
Ensure all product cards have a 'Quick View' button that appears on hover.
The primary red color (#D90429) should be used for 'Add to Cart' and primary CTAs only. Do not overuse it.
For the product catalog, use a sidebar filter on desktop and a drawer filter on mobile.
Ensure the checkout process is streamlined with clear progress indicators.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Use specific properties for transitions (NOT transition: all).
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
